bill.title: Prohibition on certain state agency contracts. Provides that a state agency may not contract with or make a grant to abortion educators. Provides that an appropriation to pay for a contract with or a grant made to an abortion educator is canceled. Requires the budget agency to: (1) determine that funds are not available for any contract with or grant made to an abortion educator; and (2) terminate the contract or grant.

history.action: First reading: referred to Committee on Judiciary
